summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Kamil Dyczkowski website complete rebuild. All required sections, content, and functionality working perfectly. Website is fully responsive and GitHub Pages compatible.

ui_bugs.issue: 2 out of 4 email buttons missing diagnostic call subject line pre-fill

passed_tests: Hero section with new headline 'Get your operations under control – before they collapse under growth'
Navigation updated with all required items: Situation, How I Work, Results, Pricing, About, Book
'Is this your situation?' section with two problem blocks: process problem and system problem
'How I work' section with 4 numbered steps working correctly
'What you get' section with 5 bullet points and checkmarks
'About Kamil' section with professional image and link to about.html
'Pricing & guarantee' section with £1,500-£3,000 price range and guarantee details
Final CTA 'Book a 20-minute diagnostic call' functioning properly
about.html page with full new content including 20+ years experience, process-first approach
Low-Noise Leadership book section with working link
'Why operations fail' section with 4 failure point cards
Scroll animations working on both pages with fade-up and stagger effects
Mobile responsiveness (390x844) - hamburger menu, mobile call button, proper layout
Interactive elements: navigation scrolling, cookie consent, click-to-reveal phone
GitHub Pages compatibility - static HTML with CDN resources
action_item_for_main_agent: Optional: Add diagnostic call subject line to remaining 2 email buttons for consistency
